message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down a bit to $165.  What do you think?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $155. Can you meet me at that price?
